title: Birds for All Seasons
brief_description: There are more than 10,000 kinds of birds and without their song, brilliant colours and flamboyant displays the world would be an impoverished place. This video, specially adapted from the major BBC television series, takes a unique look at the planet’s bird life, emphasising their responses to the changing seasons. Birds have intriguing ways of coping with the earth’s varied climates. Courtship, mating, fledging, feeding and flight, all unfold the beauty and diversity of feathered lifestyles in this superb celebration of birds worldwide. Rated: G
